DOC.brief_summary: This single arm clinical trial establish feasibility conduct clinical trial acupuncture reduce dyspnea among lung cancer survivor complete chemoradiotherapy . Twelve subject dyspnea recruit clinical trial . Up 10 session acupuncture deliver course 8-10 week . The primary outcome dyspnea measure English version Cancer Dyspnea Scale completion intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Acupuncture Feasibility Trial Dyspnea Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis Lung Cancer ( Non small cell small cell eligible ) Completion concurrent CRT least 6 month prior randomization . Dyspnea worsen Chemoradiotherapy , lead ATS dyspnea score great equal 2 ( Walks slow people age level breathlessness stop breath walk pace level ) Ability understand write English Willingness adhere studyrelated procedure Age 18 year old ECOG Performance Status 13 Current receipt therapy treatment relate pneumonitis 3 week . Surgical resection LC ( lobectomy pneumonectomy ) Another organic cause dyspnea necessitate treatment ( eg pleural effusion appropriate thoracentesis , rapidly progressive intrathoracic recurrence , symptomatic pulmonary embolus CRT , untreated anemia hemoglobin8 g/dL ) Current bleed disorder history Life expectancy 12 week , assess primary oncologist
